title: Sharon Osbourne ended up looking like Elvis after her face lift
text:
Getting plastic surgery can be a complicating experience and Sharon Osbourne wasn’t afraid to let us know about the hilarious post-op side effects.

The 67-year-old – who is married to Ozzy Osbourne – recently got a face lift this summer and admitted the surgery ended up making her look like Elvis.

Appearing on The Kelly Clarkson Show, she said: ‘I had this thing where they lifted up my mouth and then for the first week I couldn’t feel my mouth, I can hardly feel my mouth now, to be honest with you.’

The surgeons must have pulled her face back tight.

‘I couldn’t find my mouth,’ she continued. ‘It was numb and it was up on one side and I looked like Elvis.

‘All the kids and Ozzy are going “Why are you snarling at me?” and I’m like “I’m not snarling I’m not doing anything!”’

That’s it. Sharon has come down with a case of the Jailhouse Rocks.

She looks fabulous (Picture: Rob Latour/REX)

At least the snarl is gone (Picture: The Kelly Clarkson Show)

The former X Factor judge has had more than a facelift over the summer.

She revealed her plans for a ‘new face’ in May on The Talk, telling Eve, Carrie Ann Inaba, Sheryl Underwood and Rumor Willis that her surgery had been booked.

‘It was five weeks today that I had my operation,’ she said when she returned to the chat show. ‘I had my neck done, my jowls… He kind of pulled it from the top of my head and put an elastic band in it. But everything was just lifted up. So it looks more refreshed.

‘I feel okay. Still a little bit of pain. But you can’t complain when you wanted to do it.’

Her daughter Kelly Osbourne even accompanied her to the procedure and (as you would) became worried about her after the surgery.

The music manager continued: ‘When I woke up, [Kelly] told me that I was going, “Help me, help me!”

‘And she’s like, “What can I do for you?” I’m like, “Just help me” … I don’t know what I wanted help for!’
